locationmisc 0.0.0.9000

  • Changelog

New theme

new_theme.Rd

Create a new Theme object. This is a convenience wrapper for the new_single_theme() and new_multi_theme() functions.

new_theme(...)

Arguments

...

arguments to be passed to new_single_theme() or new_multi_theme().

Value

A Theme object.

Examples

# create new dataset
l <- new_dataset(
 source = tempfile(), total = 12, units = "ha",
 legend = new_continuous_legend(1, 100, c("#000000", "#1b9e77")))

# create feature using the dataset
f <- new_feature(name = "Intact Alvar Occurrence", dataset = l)

# create a theme using the single feature
st <- new_theme(name = "Intact Alvar", feature = f)

# print object
print(st)
#> Theme
#>   id:        eb1518cf-6e83-4e9b-b66a-2b410bdc9832
#>   name:      Intact Alvar
#>   mandatory: FALSE
#>   feature: 
#>     Intact Alvar Occurrence [status: TRUE, current: 0, goal: 0.1]
#>   dataset: .../file57cc2676e0c [total: 12 ha]
